summary: An example script that demonstrates how to train and evaluate a FastPitch text-to-speech model enhanced with self-supervised learning features using NVIDIA NeMo, optionally paired with a HiFi-GAN vocoder for waveform generation.
business_intent: Help developers and researchers quickly set up and run FastPitch-SSL experiments, illustrating best practices for model configuration, training loops, and integration with a neural vocoder within the NeMo framework.
